metadata.title: CVE-2017-7186 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: libpcre1 in PCRE 8.40 and libpcre2 in PCRE2 10.23 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation violation for read access, and application crash) by triggering an invalid Unicode property lookup.

notes.note: mdeslaur> pcre32 support enabled only in pcre3/1:8.35-4

criterions.comment: pcre2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.32-4').
pcre3 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:8.39-3').
